title: 11/24/21: New attendance report for your employee
content: In order to facilitate your individual meetings with your employees, it is now possible to download an attendance report from your employee's file with one click.This report will give you access to the following indicators:Number of absences, absenteeism rate, number of authorized VS unauthorized absences, number of latenesses, late rate, late ends of shift, long breaks and meals, training hours and shadowings.This report provides data for the last 3 years (page 1), and for the current year with monthly figures (page 2)This feature is only available to users who have subscribed to the Emprez BI module.To order your module, click here.Here's how to access it:Fromthe employee's file,Click on Export to PDF, the document will be downloaded instantly.  Helpful?00Updated: 3 years ago Share :
